cause.description:
Rex Magner was a long-time teacher in the Vigo County School Corporation and a member of Phi Mu Alpha Sinfonia. It is the least we can do to repay his dedication and hard-work by leaving a legacy in his memory.
1. Rex Magner deserves to be honored.
2. The rising cost of education makes this endeavor an excellent avenue.
cause.mission: To endow this scholarship for the Indiana State University Department of Music, so future generations may be able to further their studies.
cause.name: Rex Magner Memorial Scholarship
